mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user(user_id, user_pw, user_phone, user_address, user_email, user_nickname) values(#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_phone}, #{user_address}, #{user_email}, #{user_nickname} )
mapper.select: select count(*) as result from tbl_user where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.update: update tbl_user set user_phone=#{phone}, user_address=#{address}, user_email=#{email}, user_nickname=#{nick} where user_id=#{id}
update tbl_user set user_pw=#{newpw} where user_id=#{id}
